block.p: WHITMAN-Sylvia. On June 24, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Leo. Loving mother of Marcia Goldin, Richard Whitman, Diane Raftery, Wendy White. Cherished grandmother of Peter, Jon, and Laura Goldin, Derek and Melissa Whitman, Renee and Ryan Raftery, Great-grandmother of Eli and Sophie Brett-Goldin, and Olivia Christine Goldin-Du Bois. Services Wednesday, 11:15 AM, at ''The Riverside,'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
